title: arumukhA
sahitya:
arumukhA aDimaiyaik-kai viDudal aramalla iraivanE ten pazhani


anupallavi

  kuru naghai azhagilE aruL pozhiyum kumaranE guru paranE muruganE


caraNam    catur mukhan mudalAm sakala amarargaLum sharaNam sharaNam enRu paNi malarp-padanE aran umai manamagizh maganE tAraka nAdi asurar paDai maDiya vEl toTTa
